TopicTitle: Changing the camera in Map view

Articles.Content:
In map view looking at Kerbin (to set a maneuver or whatever) I find moving around very awkward. Is there a way to unlock the camera so that it can move freely. When you're going to set a maneuver, time is precious and fumbling around trying to get a proper view of the Apoapsis, etc, is difficult. Anything?

Edited October 10, 2015 by JackBush

Unfortunately no.
